message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $950,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $700,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the value of the product to me.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a lower price, but $700,000 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $850,000, which is still a significant discount from my initial offer and leaves room for both of us to walk away satisfied. Let me know if you're interested in this compromise.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers, so I'll offer $775,000. This is the highest I'm willing to go, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
